description:
Construction of part 6 storey plus basement; part 5 storey plus basement and part single storey plus basement office building (B1 use).  Associated minor alterations to existing residential/office building on site including installation of an external fire escape staircase. 

 APPLICANTS' PLAN NOS.:  PL02, PL03, PL04, PL05, PL06, PL07,                         PL08, PL09, PL10, PL11, PL12, PL13,                         PL14
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of five years from the date of this permission. 

 REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 91(1) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990
